channel.title: ONE OF YOUR ALLIES HAS A POTENSIAL HERE
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ONE OF YOUR ALLIES HAS A POTENSIAL HERE"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: There's no jutsu that you need to use to level up an ally. Just look up the mission on the Wiki, find out what ally levels on that mission, and put them in your party.

item.title: Re: ONE OF YOUR ALLIES HAS A POTENSIAL HERE
item.content:encoded:
thank you for the caps…

but, my q is what should i do when that msg appear. what jutsu used ? or anyelse i can do in my team.
ex : nin mission, n that msg appear. i have 3 teams.

tq again

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Find the 'Caps Lock' key on the left side of your keyboard and press it. I would rather read a post in all lowercase than one in all caps…

That message means one of your allies may level up if they are in your team when you complete the mission. It does not guarentee that they will level up, nor does it tell you which ally…but if you're trying to figure out which ally, that's one of the reasons the Mission pages are there.

item.title: ONE OF YOUR ALLIES HAS A POTENSIAL HERE
item.content:encoded: WHAT IS THAT MEAN ?? WHAT SHOULD I DO ??
